activities: There are 2 channels which we receive customer personal data. One is our physical Youthcam where a customer enters in their contact information at the physical location. The 2nd is our ecommerce website that collects personal data as part of the order process.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer personal data(facial picture, name, email address, mailing and billing address)
